page.title: 18HOUSING.
page.content: In the area where we live most of the streets are{littered}with paper,cans etc.Some people like the place to look nice and tidy but others don't care and just throw things on the floor and the area is spoiled. People put their bags of rubbish in the entries and dogs and cats open them then they start to smell.There are quite a few {derelict houses}around too.Most of these{houses}are old and are being modernised,but as they are being modernised and new windows are being put in youths often come and smash the windows so they have to be replaced. All the{litter}in the streets and the {houses}with broken windows make the area look untidy and would make some people think it was a rough place,so they wouldn't want to come around {Kirkdale}to buy property or visit here. {(Lisa Moore)
